MiringResult.description: For every consensus-sequence-block node, the child sequence node must have a length of (end - start).
MiringResult.solution: Please check the sequence length against the start and end attributes.

MiringResult.description: The node consensus-sequence-block is missing a expected-copy-number attribute.
MiringResult.solution: Please add a expected-copy-number attribute to the consensus-sequence-block node.

MiringResult.description: The node consensus-sequence-block is missing a continuity attribute.
MiringResult.solution: Please add a continuity attribute to the consensus-sequence-block node.

MiringResult.description: On a sequence quality node, the sequence-start and sequence-end attributes must be between 0 and (consensus-sequence-block:end - consensus-sequence-block:start) inclusive.
MiringResult.solution: A sequence-quality node has a sequence-start and sequence-end attributes. They refer to positions within the consensus-sequence-block, and therefore must be contained within the range of parent's end and start.

MiringResult.description: The end attribute on a variant node should be less than or equal to the end attribute on the corresponding reference-sequence node.
MiringResult.solution: Verify that the start and end attributes on the variant are >= and <= to the start and end attributes on the corresponding reference sequence.

MiringResult.description: A reference-sequence node has an id attribute with no corresponding consensus-sequence-block id attribute.
MiringResult.solution: This is a warning, not a serious error. consensus-sequence-block:reference-sequence-id must have a corresponding reference-sequence:id, but the opposite is not necessarily true.

MiringResult.description: The node reference-sequence is missing a uri attribute.
MiringResult.solution: accession and uri attributes are expected for unambiguous identification of the publicly hosted reference sequence. Include them if they are available.

MiringResult.description: The node consensus-sequence-block is missing a phase-set attribute.
MiringResult.solution: Phasing information is not strictly required, this is just a warning.

MiringResult.description: The hmlid root is formatted like an OID.
MiringResult.solution: No solution needed. This is a good thing.
